mapper.select: SELECT OD.UID, OD.CONTENT, OD.USERUID, OD.INSERTBY, OD.INSERTDATE, OD.UPDATEBY, OD.UPDATEDATE, U.ID AS userName FROM ONELINEDIARY OD JOIN USER U ON (OD.USERUID = U.UID) ORDER BY INSERTBY DESC LIMIT 10
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ONELINEDIARY (CONTENT, USERUID, INSERTBY, INSERTDATE, UPDATEBY, UPDATEDATE) VALUES (#{content}, #{userUid}, #{insertBy}, SYSDATE(), #{updateBy}, SYSDATE())
